while both my parents have thick european accents , i do not.

i am an ovo vegetarian.
i like to make boats on the weekends.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I like to make boats on the weekends. How about you?
Oh that sounds fun! I practice karate and study baseball to improve my skills for my dream job.
Karate sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I was athletic enough to do that.
It's really not that hard! You should try it out.
Maybe I will! I'm not sure how I would fit that in with my schedule though.
Well you could always try it out and see if you like it! I'm sure you'll be able to find a way to fit it in.
I'll definitely think about it! I really need to find a way to get more exercise.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find a way to make it work.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
